moves.4. Nf3 Bg7 5. e3: I personally think that 4.Nf3 and 5.e3 are a mistake. White may play 4. e3 and 5. Ne2, because in this position the Bishop can't attack  the white in g4 (6. f3).
moves.5... Bg4 6. Be2 O-O 7. O-O Re8 8. Ne5 Bx: This is a mistake. White must remove the pawn in d5
moves.12... e5 13. e4 Nxe4: Black gains a pawn. In case of 14. Nxe4 black have to play exd4, attacking the Knight in e4
